resources.string: Unfortunately, there is no application that can handle this operation
First type repo name to search

Most probably cases of Error: 
 - Low or absent internet connection - check it ! 
 - Reached limit of request: 
 Application can provide 6000 repository or 60 request per hour 
 Try to make your inquiry as accurate as possible !

Here u can type name of Repo u are looking for.
 
REMEMBER ! 
Try to make your inquiry as accurate as possible ! 
Application can provide 6000 repository or 60 request per hour
Here u will see the result of the search
